transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir, shubham baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan maine customer care number pe baat call kiya tha, kisi ne uthaya nahi tha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir wo basically maine call aaya tha mere paas main us time call pe tha isliye maine aapka cut kiya tha.
Executive: To abhi just meri call.
Customer: Haan ji bhai sahab call kiya tha maine ki mere paas mein aur bhi number se call aati rehti hai ki call wagera karne ke liye to main ye batana chah raha hu ki abhi mera business koi bhi ek saal run karne wala hai nahi kyuki main is location pe ruk nahi pa raha hu business chal bhi nahi pa raha hai paise bhi invest nahi karne situation mein hu isliye bhi main postpone karna hai to agar possible ho to aap mera IndiaMART se aap mera refund karwa dijiye please.
Executive: Sir refund to possible nahi hai sir matlab aap refund kyu chah rahe ho sir?
Customer: Haan kyuki main kai baar maine try kiya ho sakta hai ho jaye isliye main ek dedh mahine se try karta bhi raha lekin finally yahi hua ki business partner ke sath mein deal nahi ho pa rahi hai business chal nahi pa raha hai.
Customer: To mera loss hai isme to main kuch kar nahi sakta isiliye main chah raha hu ki agar aap refund kar denge to bahut achcha rahega.
Executive: Sir ye cheez hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap internally discuss karke fir mujhe batana aap bata do ki mera business abhi ek saal dedh saal mein active ho hi nahi ho sakta meri GST bhi close karana pad jaye to fir is situation mein kya kar sakta hu abhi mera do mahine pehle ka hi registration hai isme koi mujhe matlab main bahut jyada service kuch le bhi nahi paya aur partner ke sath mein deal ho nahi pa rahi jo main chah raha tha jaisa ho jayega waisa hua nahi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To aap internally aap request dal dijiye aur fir mujhe update deke batana ki kab tak ye possible ho payega.
Executive: Main ek baar baat kar leta hu sir main aise bata nahi paunga main ek baar senior se baat kar leta hu.
Customer: Haan aap bata do ki waise to mere paas mein jo aaya tha usme refund policy thi active tabhi maine registration yahi tha mujhe pata nahi tha ki main abhi naya shuru karne ja raha hu ho sakta hai chale na chale teen saade teen mahine ke baad mein yahi ho raha hai ki matlab main aage ek saal dedh saal tak ye chala nahi paunga business kam ho nahi payega abhi.
Executive: Sir abhi to matlab aapne august mein service li thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Waise agar aap use karoge to kaafi achcha business milta hai sir aisa nahi hai ki nahi milta hai.
Customer: IndiaMART to business dega na aap lead dega mature karke client dega lekin hum delivery nahi kar payenge to fayda kya hua service ka.
Customer: Hame lag gaya na hame samajh mein aa gaya isiliye abhi humne aage tak nahi bola abhi tak to hum bol rahe the ki kar lenge try lekin abhi final jab baat ho gayi isiliye maine aaj call bhi laya ki baat kar lu abhi main is business ko aage nahi le ja pa raha hu main product deliver nahi kar pa raha hu product even mere paas maal pahunch bhi nahi pa raha.
Executive: Okay matlab ye jo aap product jo hai wo aapka delivery se dikkat ho rahi hai matlab kya dikkat jyada dikkat kis mein ho rahi hai?
Customer: Isme investment kaafi kar diya lekin jo partners hai usme wo dispute ki wajah se wo business aur finance ki wajah se business aage ja nahi pa raha hai hold ho raha hai isiliye aap log call karte ho mere ko to main answer nahi kar pa raha kyuki mujhe lagta hai ki haan chal jayega kar lenge lekin abhi final jab baat ho gayi ki nahi ek dedh saal kuch ho sakta hai possible fir maine baat kiya customer care mein bata du ki main agar aap refund kar dijiye mera mera abhi ek dedh saal carry on nahi kar pa raha.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir ye cheez to mujhe ek baar discuss karni padegi kyuki aap baat kar lijiye haan baat kar lijiye number mere paas mein aapka hai fir main aapse kal morning mein dopahar tak kisi time fir call karke baat kar lunga theek hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Ek baar discuss kar lijiye aap internally fir mujhe aap bata dena mere ko refund chahiye kyuki mere abhi abhi kar mein fayda nahi hai mere ko aage aur invest karne ka isme.
Executive: Bilkul sir aapki baat sahi hai lekin main nahi kya hota hai na ki ek baar IndiaMART se aap service lete ho na usages wagera karte ho to matlab ab aap bol rahe ho ki aap matlab aapka jo product hai aap kahin deliver nahi kar sakte ho to dikkat ye hai.
Customer: Delivery ki kya hai hame uski manufacturing hum log karte hai na manufacturing ho gayi lekin jo mere partners hai business akele to chalta nahi lekin wo unme dispute se nahi baat ho pa rahi hai to wo wo bhi conversation itne din ho gaye teen mahine hum kuch nahi kar paye aap khud hi record dekh lo abhi dekhte dekhte saal nikal jayega mera paisa chala jayega isme kareeb 30 35000 maine dal diya to main isliye kah raha hu ki jab main dobara se active honga main fir registration karwa lunga jab mujhe lagega ki nahi chalegi ye saal mera bekar chala jayega matlab mera matlab ye hai ki jo maine paise aapko diye hai wo aise hi chala gaya.
Executive: 33 aapne july month mein pay kiya tha na 21 july ko aapne payment kiya tha 3340 ka.
Customer: Haan to 33 35000 mere isme ja chuke hai aur dekhte dekhte abhi ek saal nikal jayega main isme kar kuch paunga nahi paise bekar chale jayenge.
Customer: Ye situation hai isliye main call kar raha hu.
Executive: Main baat kar leta hu ek baar main main ek baar baat kar leta hu apne senior se.
Customer: Haan please aap baat kar lijiye kyuki mujhe dobara lena bhi hoga to main aapke hi platform pe dobara se registration kara lunga ho sakta hai chhah saat chhah saat mahine baad karwa lu lekin abhi mujhe pata hai main chhah saat aath mahine kuch karne wala hu nahi dheere se abhi april mein hi aa jayega mera paisa chala jayega fayda kuch nahi hoga mere ko yahan se.
Executive: Main ek baar ye cheez discuss karta hu sir main aise nahi bata sakta aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi main aapko samjha hi nahi raha maine aapko apni baat batai aap aage batao aur fir aap batana ki unko abhi ek saal tak unka business chalne ja nahi raha hai to ye jo paisa unhone ek saal ke liye de diya uska fayda unhe kuch milne wala hai nahi isliye wo keh rahe hai ki aap please refund kar doge to bahut achcha rahega mera.
Executive: Main baat kar leta hu sir ek baar.
Customer: Okay ji fine fine thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for subscription.

- Business not running due to partner issues.

- Unable to deliver products.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss the refund with seniors.

- Executive will call back the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, delivery, partners
